video_prompt: A figure in flowing dark garments watches as a luminous, golden elliptical portal pulses and throws off sparkling particles. Dust and debris swirl violently around the glowing ring, obscuring its base. The stormy sky darkens, reflecting the chaos.
image_prompt: Generate a dramatic vertical image: A cloaked figure stands in a desolate, dusty desert facing a large, glowing golden-orange elliptical light portal. Swirling brown dust and debris billow around the portal, with scattered dark particles in the air. The sky is stormy and overcast, matching the earthy tones of the landscape. Sparse dark vegetation is visible in the foreground. The overall mood is mysterious and powerful.
refined_video_prompt: Dark garments flow and ripple around a figure whose gaze intensely follows. A golden, elliptical portal rhythmically pulses, continuously emitting a stream of sparkling particles. Dust and debris violently churn, progressively obscuring the portal's base. The stormy sky rapidly darkens, dynamically mirroring the unfolding chaos.
